rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 4 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 4:58 PM, 24 June 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Tarlac, Nueva Ecija, Batangas, Quezon, Bataan and Zambales within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bulacan(San Jose del Monte, Norzagaray, Dona Remedios Trinidad, San Miguel, San Ildefonso, San Rafael), Rizal(Rodriguez, Pililla, Jala-Jala), Metro Manila(Quezon City, Caloocan, Valenzuela, Las Pinas), Cavite(Imus, Dasmarinas, Bacoor) and Laguna(Mabitac, Pakil, Pangil, Siniloan, Famy) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
